name: Duck Life Hunting Season
description:
The amazing traits of the game suggest you full grown duck shooting modes with various specific climates. Every stage encloses unlimited flying ducks in a new environment and provides you challenging opportunity to earn fame like best duck hunter amidst your social circle.

The birds escape program has very alluring composition and easy playing format. Just stretch the rope and release to kill each duck. The same strategy should be used from first to end. You have the chance of limited missing shots, up to that will make you game loser. Restart it with new passion, the successful finishing of the first stage will ultimately open new hunting doors. You can unlock other Bow arrows and stages with best duck shooting power.

Game Features
- Light Music duck shoot adventure
- Lively, natural environments
- Funny bird escapes show
- Six dynamic playing modes
- 2D graphical archery hunting
- Locked arrow bows
- The slight danger of losing the game

How to Play
Although the Duck Life Hunting Season Game 2018 is hard to ignore it has very simple steps to play.
- After downloading it very first time put finger on the start
- Use your thumb of a finger on the bow and point the arrow on duck
- Remove the finger to release it to kill a duck
- The duck will be dying with extreme protesting sound
- You can share the app with other peoples
